00077 typedef enum
00078 {
00079    EBhRequire,
00080    EBhEnable,
00081    EBhWarn,
00082    EBhDisable
00083 } TBehavior;
00084 
00085 struct TPragma
00086 {
00087    TPragma(bool o, bool d) : optimize(o), debug(d)
00088    {
00089    }
00090    bool optimize;
00091    bool debug;
00092    TPragmaTable pragmaTable;
00093 };
00094 
00095 //
00096 // The following are extra variables needed during parsing, grouped together so
00097 // they can be passed to the parser without needing a global.
00098 //
00099 struct TParseContext
00100 {
00101    TParseContext(TSymbolTable& symt, TIntermediate& interm, EShLanguage L, TInfoSink& is) : 
00102    intermediate(interm), symbolTable(symt), infoSink(is), language(L), treeRoot(0),
00103    recoveredFromError(false), numErrors(0), lexAfterType(false), loopNestingLevel(0), 
00104    inTypeParen(false), contextPragma(true, false)
00105    {
00106    }
00107    TIntermediate& intermediate; // to hold and build a parse tree
00108    TSymbolTable& symbolTable;   // symbol table that goes with the language currently being parsed
00109    TInfoSink& infoSink;
00110    EShLanguage language;        // vertex or fragment language (future: pack or unpack)
00111    TIntermNode* treeRoot;       // root of parse tree being created
00112    bool recoveredFromError;     // true if a parse error has occurred, but we continue to parse
00113    int numErrors;
00114    bool lexAfterType;           // true if we've recognized a type, so can only be looking for an identifier
00115    int loopNestingLevel;        // 0 if outside all loops
00116    bool inTypeParen;            // true if in parentheses, looking only for an identifier
00117    const TType* currentFunctionType;  // the return type of the function that's currently being parsed
00118    bool functionReturnsValue;   // true if a non-void function has a return
00119 
00120 #ifdef _WIN32
00121    TMap<TString, TBehavior> extensionBehavior;
00122 #else
00123    TMap<const TString, TBehavior> extensionBehavior;
00124 #endif
00125 
00126    void initializeExtensionBehavior();
00127 
00128    void C_DECL error(TSourceLoc, const char *szReason, const char *szToken, 
00129                      const char *szExtraInfoFormat, ...);
00130    bool reservedErrorCheck(int line, const TString& identifier);
00131    void recover();
00132 
00133    bool parseVectorFields(const TString&, int vecSize, TVectorFields&, int line);
00134    bool parseMatrixFields(const TString&, int matSize, TVectorFields&, int line);
00135    void assignError(int line, const char* op, TString left, TString right);
00136    void unaryOpError(int line, char* op, TString operand);
00137    void binaryOpError(int line, char* op, TString left, TString right);
00138    bool lValueErrorCheck(int line, char* op, TIntermTyped*);
00139    bool constErrorCheck(TIntermTyped* node);
00140    bool integerErrorCheck(TIntermTyped* node, char* token);
00141    bool globalErrorCheck(int line, bool global, char* token);
00142    bool constructorErrorCheck(int line, TIntermNode*, TFunction&, TOperator, TType*);
00143    bool arraySizeErrorCheck(int line, TIntermTyped* expr, int& size);
00144    bool arrayQualifierErrorCheck(int line, TPublicType type);
00145    bool arrayTypeErrorCheck(int line, TPublicType type);
00146    bool arrayErrorCheck(int line, TString& identifier, TPublicType type, TVariable*& variable);
00147    bool arrayErrorCheck(int line, TString& identifier, const TTypeInfo *info, TPublicType type, TVariable*& variable);
00148    bool insertBuiltInArrayAtGlobalLevel();
00149    bool voidErrorCheck(int, const TString&, const TPublicType&);
00150    bool boolErrorCheck(int, const TIntermTyped*);
00151    bool boolErrorCheck(int, const TPublicType&);
00152    bool samplerErrorCheck(int line, const TPublicType& pType, const char* reason);
00153    bool structQualifierErrorCheck(int line, const TPublicType& pType);
00154    bool parameterSamplerErrorCheck(int line, TQualifier qualifier, const TType& type);
00155    bool containsSampler(TType& type);
00156    bool nonInitConstErrorCheck(int line, TString& identifier, TPublicType& type);
00157    bool nonInitErrorCheck(int line, TString& identifier, const TTypeInfo *info, TPublicType& type);
00158    bool nonInitErrorCheck(int line, TString& identifier, TPublicType& type);
00159    bool paramErrorCheck(int line, TQualifier qualifier, TQualifier paramQualifier, TType* type);
00160    bool extensionErrorCheck(int line, const char*);
00161    const TFunction* findFunction(int line, TFunction* pfnCall, bool *builtIn = 0);
00162    bool executeInitializer(TSourceLoc line, TString& identifier, const TTypeInfo *info, TPublicType& pType, 
00163                            TIntermTyped* initializer, TIntermNode*& intermNode, TVariable* variable = 0);
00164    bool executeInitializer(TSourceLoc line, TString& identifier, TPublicType& pType, 
00165                            TIntermTyped* initializer, TIntermNode*& intermNode, TVariable* variable = 0);
00166    bool areAllChildConst(TIntermAggregate* aggrNode);
00167    TIntermTyped* addConstructor(TIntermNode*, const TType*, TOperator, TFunction*, TSourceLoc);
00168    TIntermTyped* foldConstConstructor(TIntermAggregate* aggrNode, const TType& type);
00169    TIntermTyped* constructArray(TIntermAggregate*, const TType*, TOperator, TSourceLoc);
00170    TIntermTyped* constructStruct(TIntermNode*, TType*, int, TSourceLoc, bool subset);
00171    TIntermTyped* constructBuiltIn(const TType*, TOperator, TIntermNode*, TSourceLoc, bool subset);
00172    TIntermTyped* addConstVectorNode(TVectorFields&, TIntermTyped*, TSourceLoc);
00173    TIntermTyped* addConstMatrixNode(int , TIntermTyped*, TSourceLoc);
00174    TIntermTyped* addConstArrayNode(int index, TIntermTyped* node, TSourceLoc line);
00175    TIntermTyped* addConstStruct(TString& , TIntermTyped*, TSourceLoc);
00176    TIntermTyped* addAssign(TOperator op, TIntermTyped* left, TIntermTyped* right, TSourceLoc);
00177    TIntermTyped* addBinaryMath(TOperator op, TIntermTyped* left, TIntermTyped* right, TSourceLoc, TSymbolTable&);
00178    TIntermAggregate* mergeAggregates( TIntermAggregate *left, TIntermAggregate *right);
00179    bool arraySetMaxSize(TIntermSymbol*, TType*, int, bool, TSourceLoc);
00180    TOperator getConstructorOp( const TType&);
00181    TIntermNode* promoteFunctionArguments( TIntermNode *node, const TFunction* func);
00182    struct TPragma contextPragma;
00183    TString HashErrMsg; 
00184    bool AfterEOF;
00185 };
